physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient presented with bulky cervical lymphadenopathy. A history of splenomegaly and intestinal obstruction due to mesenteric lymphadenopathy and severe thrombocytopenia were noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially diagnosed with ALPS and without lymphoma, two years later developed cervical lymphadenopathy with fever, weight loss, and itching, leading to the diagnosis of a diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma.
